items.sentence: I never understood why Tom liked Mary so much.
I often make mistakes when speaking in French.
I often spend my free time listening to music.
Tom told me that he didn\'t love Mary anymore.
Tom told me that he hadn\'t seen Mary all day.
Tom said he\'d be here, but I can\'t find him.
Tom said he\'d rather not go to Mary\'s party.
Tom denied he had been involved in the affair.
Tom denied knowing anything about the robbery.
Tom devoted his whole life to studying sharks.
